numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that most young people send text messages to their parents.
2. I notice that only a small number of young people visit their parents in person.
3. I wonder whether distance is a reason for this behavior.
4. I wonder whether timing is a reason for this behavior.
5. I wonder whether laziness is a reason for this behavior.
6. I wonder whether other excuses are reasons for this behavior.
8. Many people in my community will soon go to college.
9. People in my community need new ways to catch up with their parents.
10. I ask whether technology is slowly creating a wedge between relationships.
